definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: The speaker declaimed against the government's new law.
sentences.chinese: 演說者攻擊政府頒佈的新法令。

sentences.english: The new laws empower the police to stop anybody in the street.
sentences.chinese: 新法令授予警方可在街上截停任何人的權力。

sentences.english: The majority of presidential decrees do not get implemented.
sentences.chinese: 總統的多數法令無法得到執行。

sentences.english: The people should be persuaded to become accustomed to observing the decrees of the anti-Japanese democratic government.
sentences.chinese: 在人民中，要養成遵守抗日民主政權法令的習慣。

sentences.english: Bob is an excellent trial lawyer with a superior legal acumen.
sentences.chinese: 鮑勃是一名超卓的辯護律師，他擁有超羣的法令才智。

sentences.english: Spain's law on "self-supply" involves energy-saving housing.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的“自主供應”法令有涉及住房節能問題。

sentences.english: Such laws are, for the most part, still on the books.
sentences.chinese: 這些法令大部分現在還是一紙空文。

sentences.english: If you are comfortable with that, then you can decree whatever you want to decree .
sentences.chinese: 如果你是滿意的，二人轉，那麼你可以令你想做法令。

sentences.english: Warfarin is the better choice in the anticoagulative treatment of atrial fibrillation.
sentences.chinese: 而華法令是目前心房顫動抗凝較好的選擇。

sentences.english: The sheriffs were unable to carry out the order.
sentences.chinese: 郡長不能履行這個法令。

sentences.english: The statute legalizing lottery existed as early as 1847.
sentences.chinese: 在1847年，澳門已有賭博合法化的法令。

sentences.english: A doctrinal or disciplinary act of an ecumenical council.
sentences.chinese: 教令全基督教會議的教義或紀律法令。

sentences.english: The president abrogated an old law.
sentences.chinese: 總統廢除了一項舊法令。

sentences.english: The Act applies to all restaurants and cafes .
sentences.chinese: 該條法令適用於全部餐館和咖啡館。

sentences.english: An edict has been issued temporarily abolishing the land tax in Shantung, as the people are unable to pay it owing to the famine.
sentences.chinese: 饑荒使農民無力納稅，山東已發佈法令臨時取消田賦。

sentences.english: This allowed him to stay calm and think fast.
sentences.chinese: 這個想法令他冷靜下來而且腦子快速地轉着。

definition: to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
to repeal (a law)/to put an end to/abolition/annulled
to put in place/to put into practice/to take effect
